item.description:
Join us for drinks and dinner at Not Your Average Joe's in Needham. This is a fun and casual restaurant with good food and reasonable prices.

It will be a great evening with outgoing and interesting people! Everyone pays for their own food/drink. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000. Joint event with the New England 25+ Social Fun group.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo). I will be carrying a large red purse.
item.name: Drinks, Dinner and Fun Times at Not Your Average Joe's, Needham
